author: TechHut
description:
To try everything Brilliant has to offer—free—for a full 30 days, visit  https://brilliant.org/TechHut/. You’ll also get 20% off an annual premium subscription. In this video we are building the foundation to ditch some of the leading cloud platforms! Nextcloud can replace many of the services Microsoft, Google, Dropbox, Apple, and others offer.
